frameset.edef: To relate or narrate, to present

example.parse: (S (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفندق)))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM اللبنانيون)) (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:I يسردون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC حكايات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC عذابات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))))))
